<<<<<<< HEAD
A relation of the death of the primitive persecutors written originally in Latin by L.C.F. Lactantius ; Englished by Gilbert Burnet, D.D., to which he hath made a large preface concerning persecution. De mortibus persecutorum. English Lactantius, ca. 240-ca. 320. Burnet, Gilbert, 1643-1715.
167 p.
Printed for J.S., Amsterdam : 1687.
Reproduction of original in Union Theological Seminary Library, New York. Errata: p. 167.
=======

167 p.
Printed for J.S., Amsterdam : 1687.
Reproduction of original in Union Theological Seminary Library, New York. Errata: p. 167.
